data.title: Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global - Saturday - Leek Duck
data.meta_description: The biggest Pokémon GO event of the year is almost here, and the adventure is going global! Join up with millions of other Trainers from around the world and get ready for Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global! Over 70 Pokémon will appear during the event, plus special costumed Pokémon, bonuses,...
data.text:
Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global - Saturday

Bonuses

All Trainers will receive the following bonuses and rewards during event hours.

Ticket holders will receive the following bonuses and rewards during event hours.

Features

A ghostly sighting—Marshadow makes its global entrance in Pokémon GO!

After its appearances in Sendai, Madrid, and New York City, the Mythical Pokémon Marshadow will make its global Pokémon GO debut on the first day of Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global.

Ticket-holding Trainers will be able to complete exclusive Special Research to learn more about the Gloomdweller Pokémon—and have an opportunity to encounter it!

Trainers will only encounter Marshadow once no matter how many Pokémon GO Fest 2024 Special Research stories they acquire and complete. If you obtained a Special Research from an in-person 2024 GO Fest event, you will receive Marshadow Candy as the final reward for the global GO Fest 2024 Special Research instead of another Marshadow.

Global Challenge Arena

During each habitat hour on Saturday, ticket-holding Trainers around the world will be able to work together to complete a challenge! If the challenge is completed in time, the following bonuses will be unlocked for the remainder of the hour for ticketed Trainers!

Hello Jangmo-o

Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global attendees will be able to encounter Shiny Jangmo-o for the first time in Pokémon GO—if they’re lucky!

Jangmo-o

Hakamo-o

Kommo-o

Umbreon and Espeon are celebrating GO Fest 2024 in style!

Espeon wearing a day scarf and Umbreon wearing a night scarf will be attracted to Incense for ticket-holding Trainers during GO Fest 2024: Global.

Espeon and Umbreon are also appearing in the wild during certain habitats.

Party Play and Routes!

Grab your friends—new Party Play challenges exclusive to Pokémon GO Fest will be available to ticket-holding Trainers! Work together with friends to earn encounters with Pikachu wearing a Sun Tiara and Pikachu wearing a Moon Tiara!

Sun Crown Pikachu

Moon Crown Pikachu

Additionally, Trainers that walk Routes during Pokémon GO Fest: Global will be able to encounter Ducklett, Emolga, and Crabrawler more frequently!

Ducklett

Emolga

Crabrawler

Field Research Bonanza

On Saturday, July 13, Trainers will be able to collect Field Research tasks from PokéStops that change each hour from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. local time!

Special Backgrounds during Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global

On Saturday, July 13, from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. local time, all Trainers will have a chance of receiving Special Backgrounds from Ultra Beasts and Necrozma in five-star raids after making a successful catch!

Photobomb Encounters

Take a snapshot to get photobombed by Sun Crown Pikachu or Moon Crown Pikachu. The photobomb is dependent on the current habitat.

During Dawn Meadow or Shining Day, you’ll get photobombed by Sun Crown Pikachu.

During Creeping Dusk or Darkest Night, you’ll get photobombed by Moon Crown Pikachu.

Ticket holders can get up to 5 photobomb encounters per day.

Trainers without tickets will have 1 photobomb encounter per day.

Sun Crown Pikachu

Moon Crown Pikachu

Pokémon Showcases

Be on the lookout for Showcases at PokéStops where you can enter Necrozma!

Necrozma

Spawns

Special Pokémon will appear in the wild!

For all Trainers, special Pokémon will appear in four unique habitats, which will rotate hourly during the event!

For ticket holders, the certain Pokémon will be attracted to Incense—excluding Daily Adventure Incense—during event hours.

In 7 km Eggs

Trainers with Tickets will be able to hatch these Pokémon from 7 km Eggs from Gifts.

Raids

Moon Crown Pikachu

Sun Crown Pikachu

Jangmo-o

Appearing in 3-Star Raids

Day Scarf Espeon

Night Scarf Umbreon

Appearing in 5-Star Raids

The following Pokémon will appear in raids during GO Fest 2024: Global!

Fusion Energy will not be rewarded from Necrozma raids on Saturday. They will only be available from Necrozma Fusion raids on Sunday.

Nihilego

Buzzwole

Pheromosa

Xurkitree

Celesteela

Kartana

Guzzlord

Necrozma

Stakataka

Blacephalon

Research

Field Research Tasks

Field Research will be themed around the different Pokémon habitats.

Remember that for this event you can collect new Field Research from PokéStops every hour even if you’ve completed Field Research from that PokéStop earlier.

GO Fest 2024: A Shadowy Caper

Ticket-exclusive Special Research

Ticket-holding Trainers will be able to complete exclusive Special Research to learn more about the Mythical Pokémon Marshadow—and have an opportunity to encounter it!

* If you already have a Marshadow, you will recieve 25 Marshadow Candy at the end of Step 5.

Collection Challenges

Ticket-holding Trainers will be able to Level up their Elite Collector medal by completing habitat-themed Collection Challenges!

Shiny

Shiny Jangmo-o

Jangmo-o will be released in its shiny variant with the start of Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global.

Jangmo-o

Hakamo-o

Kommo-o

Shiny Ultra Beasts GO Fest Debuts

Buzzwole

Pheromosa

Xurkitree

Necrozma

Previous GO Fest Debuts

The following shiny Pokémon debuted during Pokémon GO Fest events hosted in Sendai, Madrid, and New York City. They will be available during Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global.

Emolga

Crabrawler

Crabominable

Ducklett

Swanna

Sales

Exclusive Avatar T-Shirt

Trainers who purchase their ticket from the Pokémon GO Web Store will receive an exclusive GO Fest 2024 shirt avatar item in an exclusive color.

Pokémon GO Fest 2024 Tee

You can pick up the following avatar item from the in-game shop starting July 8, 2024.

Sun Crown and Moon Crown

The following avatar items will be available for purchase from July 8

New Avatar Items

The following avatar items will be available for purchase from July 8.

Necrozma Top

Necrozma Pants

Necrozma Shoes

Necrozma Shades

Alolan Exeggutor Hat

Pokémon GO Fest 2024 T-shirts

We’re ultra-excited to reveal that the Pokémon featured on the official Pokémon GO Fest 2024 T-shirt will be Necrozma! You’ll be able to commemorate your GO Fest 2024 experience and show your love for the Prism Pokémon with this awesome T-shirt!

The GO Fest 2024 T-shirt is available now, while supplies last!

Exclusive Moves

The following featured attacks will be available through evolution. These Featured Attacks are available on Saturday and expected to be available Sunday during the event. It’s possible they are available after the event ends for the day but that is not currently confirmed.

Featured Attacks

Charizard - Blast Burn

Dragonite - Draco Meteor

Garchomp - Earth Power

Serperior - Frenzy Plant

Swampert - Hydro Cannon

Hydreigon - Brutal Swing

Haxorus - Breaking Swipe

Espeon - Last Resort (Must Evolve from Eevee)

Umbreon - Last Resort (Must Evolve from Eevee)

Ultra Unlock

Pokémon GO Fest 2024 Ultra Unlock

During each habitat hour on Saturday, ticket-holding Trainers around the world can work together to complete a Global Challenge! If the challenge is completed in time, a special bonus will be unlocked for the remainder of the hour for ticket-holding Trainers.

Plus, if Trainers complete 20 challenges successfully, they will activate this year’s Pokémon GO Fest Ultra Unlock events!

Ultra Unlock, Part 1: Better Together

Better Together, a special, to-be-announced event, will take place from Wednesday, July 17, 2024, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, July 22, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. local time.

Ultra Unlock: Pokémon Debut

A Pokémon will make its Pokémon GO debut!

Ultra Unlock: Free Timed Research

Timed Research featuring encounters with ??? and other event-themed Pokémon will be available throughout the event.

Ultra Unlock: Bonuses

2× Catch Candy

4× Catch XP

Friendship levels will increase faster than normal through opening Gifts, trading Pokémon, or battling together in raids, Gyms, or Trainer Battles

Ultra Unlock, Part 2: Strength of Steel

If Trainers complete a total of 20 Global Challenges, they’ll gain access to a to-be-announced special event that will take place on Thursday, July 25, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, July 30, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. local time!

Also, for the first time in Pokémon GO, you’ll be able to encounter Shiny ???—if you’re lucky!

Ultra Unlock, Part 3: Mega Raid Day

If Trainers complete a total of 20 Global Challenges, they’ll gain access to a to-be-announced special event that will take place on Saturday, July 27, 2024 from 11:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time!

Ultra Unlock: Mega Pokémon Debut

A Pokémon will make its Pokémon GO debut in Mega Raids!

Graphic

Leek Duck

Hey, I'm LeekDuck. I create Pokémon GO graphics, resources and report Pokémon GO news. You can find them on my Twitter, Instagram, or Facebook Page. You can also find me on Twitch and YouTube!

LeekBeats Radio
